means: 前脑，壮年人发达的脑部

sentence.Network_en: Ucn III induced Fos expression in several areas forebrain and hindbrain.
sentence.Network_cn: 结果发现,UcnIII诱导了大鼠前脑及后脑广泛脑区的Fos表达.

sentence.Network_en: Amnesic patients made far more errors, especially those with basal forebrain damage.
sentence.Network_cn: 失忆症患者所犯的错误要多得多, 尤其是基底前脑受创的患者.

sentence.Network_en: Objective To investigate if there are proliferating cells in the forebrain of young rats.
sentence.Network_cn: 目的探讨幼年大鼠前脑内是否存在增殖细胞.
